name: TAKE THE PLUNGE
description:
TAKE THE PLUNGE

Probably the greatest and most realistic plumbing simulator of all time.

Controls

WASD - Move

SPACE - Jump

LEFT CLICK AND HOLD - Plunge 😈
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made in a week by the talented team of:

Charlie Tipping

Chris R Shantz

Jason Persaud

Justin Barry

Owen Brecknock

Patryk Tokarz
